abilities.name: ***Rally (3/day).***
abilities.ability: As a bonus action, the captain can rally its allies within 30ft of itself to give them +2 to attack and damage rolls for the next round.

abilities.name: ***Call for Backup.***
abilities.ability: As a bonus action during the first round of combat, if the captain is his own territory, he can call for backup. When a captain calls for backup, 1d4 soldiers appear at the end of his turn. They each roll their own initiative.

actions.name: ***Disruptor Rifle.***
actions.action: *Ranged Weapon Attack:* +7 to hit, one target. *Hit* 9 (1d8 + 4) DC 14 Con save or stunned 1 round.

actions.name: ***Dual Blaster Pistols.***
actions.action: *Ranged Weapon Attack:* +7 to hit, one target. *Hit* 7 (1d4 + 4)
